backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with access control, profile management, achievement storage and verification logic, plus Gemini API key handling for AI chat features.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs for project documentation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑line summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/.env.example: Provides an example environment file documenting secure Gemini API key configuration for backend‑only use.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide covering environment setup, Gemini API key configuration, build steps, verification, and troubleshooting.
frontend/docs/gemini-chatbot.md: Documentation overview describing the Gemini AI chatbot integration and high‑level architecture.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the React application and defining metadata and root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration wrapping routes with theme provider, auth gate, and application shell.
frontend/src/components/AchievementDetai: Displays detailed information for an achievement including metadata, certificate image, links, and verification history.
Form for creating or editing achievements with fields, link management, image upload, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main application layout providing header, navigation, theme switching, and container for page content.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Manages authentication flow, showing loading, error, login, or protected content based on user state.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatusButton: User profile dropdown showing initials, profile info, and logout option when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBanner.tsx: Reusable error alert component displaying a title and error message.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup with fields for name, email, role, and optional student info.
frontend/src/components/SearchResultsLis: Renders a list of achievement cards with category, status, description, date, and student info, and allows viewing details.
frontend/src/components/VerificationActi: Provides verify/reject buttons with a dialog to submit notes and trigger verification actions for an achievement.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, login flow, and providing identity context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating profiles and achievements through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind styles, color variables for light/dark themes, and shared UI utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Supplies build metadata such as version, timestamp, and environment and formats it for display.
frontend/src/lib/chatbotParser.ts: Parses natural‑language prompts to extract filters like student ID, category, year, and search terms for achievement queries.
frontend/src/lib/chatbotSearch.ts: Implements prioritized achievement search logic using filters like student ID, category, text, year, and returns filtered results.
frontend/src/lib/errors.ts: Normalizes various backend and Gemini-related errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/lib/file.ts: Provides utilities to convert browser File objects to Uint8Array and to detect image MIME types.
frontend/src/lib/permissions.ts: Defines role-based permission checks for verifying and editing achievements.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains UI helpers for class merging, date formatting, category labels, and status color mapping.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates common input fields such as student ID, name, email, title, and description.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AchievementsPage.tsx: Displays user achievements, supports creating, viewing, and verifying achievements, and manages related UI state.
frontend/src/pages/ChatbotPage.tsx: Implements a chat interface using Gemini, handling message flow, context building, and error display.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders dashboard with user-specific stats, welcome message, and shortcuts based on role and achievements.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page allowing users to view and edit their name, email, and bio with loading states and role labels.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Achievement search interface supporting student ID and keyword queries, displaying results and achievement details in a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationQueuePage: Admin/professor page listing achievements pending verification with detail view and verify/reject actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing architecture goals, feature requirements, and pending work for integrating Gemini-powered chatbot functionality.
